channel.title: Stupid Spammers!
channel.description:
I hate it when those SYI spammers come with the ~ symbol in their name. That way they can't get banned.
Is there a way to fix this. Like a way to not allow ~'s in people's names?
Thanks!!
Please help me, I beg of you!

item.title: Stupid Spammers!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Austin., post:8, topic:335269”]if (playerName.startsWith("~"){
disconnected = true;
}

There, that’s a basic. Add under the init method for your server.[/quote]

if (playerName.startsWith("~" || "+"|| "-"|| "$" || "<" || "!" || ">"){ disconnected = true; } (THIS MAY NOT WORK ON SOME SERVERS BUT IS WORTH TRYING)
There, that’s a basic. Add under the init method for your server as Austin Said.

(IF THE FIRST IS FAIL TRY THIS)

if (playerName.startsWith("~") || ("+"|| ("-") || ("$") || ("<") || ("!") || (">")){ disconnected = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Spammers!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Under [CHARACTER], it’ll say “character-lastconnection” and after the “=” sign, that’s his IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Spammers!
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

Cuban0 Ftw:

This is what you do, go into your character files and find the guy with the “~” in his name, open his file, copy his IP address, then go to ipbans.txt or w.e you have for ipbans in your config folder and paste his ip into there. Save and close.

Where does it say his IP?

(btw I have a spammer right now please hurry he won’t leave)

Read full topic
